select.if: select PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COVID from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COVINFO where ACTIVITY_HEAD_ID = #{headId}::int4
select NORMAL_NOTIFY_COVID from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COVINFO where ACTIVITY_HEAD_ID = #{headId}::int4

mapper.select: select COV_RATE, EXPECT_PUSHNUM, EXPECT_COVNUM from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COV_LIST where COV_LIST_ID = #{covId}::int4
mapper.update: insert into UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COVINFO(ACTIVITY_HEAD_ID, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COVID, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COV, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_PUSHNUM, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COVNUM) select #{headId}::int4, COV_LIST_ID, COV_RATE, EXPECT_PUSHNUM, EXPECT_COVNUM from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COV_LIST t where COV_LIST_ID = #{covId}::int4 on conflict(ACTIVITY_HEAD_ID) do update set (PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COVID, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COV, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_PUSHNUM, PREHEAT_NOTIFY_COVNUM) = (select COV_LIST_ID, COV_RATE, EXPECT_PUSHNUM, EXPECT_COVNUM from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COV_LIST t where COV_LIST_ID = #{covId}::int4)

insert into UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COVINFO(ACTIVITY_HEAD_ID, NORMAL_NOTIFY_COVID, NORMAL_NOTIFY_COV, NORMAL_NOTIFY_PUSHNUM, NORMAL_NOTIFY_COVNUM) select #{headId}::int4, COV_LIST_ID, COV_RATE, EXPECT_PUSHNUM, EXPECT_COVNUM from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COV_LIST t where COV_LIST_ID = #{covId}::int4 on conflict(ACTIVITY_HEAD_ID) do update set (NORMAL_NOTIFY_COVID, NORMAL_NOTIFY_COV, NORMAL_NOTIFY_PUSHNUM, NORMAL_NOTIFY_COVNUM) = (select COV_LIST_ID, COV_RATE, EXPECT_PUSHNUM, EXPECT_COVNUM from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_COV_LIST t where COV_LIST_ID = #{covId}::int4)
mapper.select: select count(1) from uo_op_activity_covinfo where activity_head_id = #{headId}::int4
